name: Shrimp in Lobster Sauce
author: SARAHJEAN27
summary: Shrimp is simmered in a pork sauce. This recipe is my Grandmother's version of shrimp in Lobster sauce, it's the best that I know of. Try it out and see for your self, you'll love it.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add garlic, and cook for a few minutes, just until fragrant
Crumble in the pork; cook and stir until no longer pink, about 5 minutes
Add the shrimp; cook and stir until pink and opaque
Mix in the soy sauce, sugar and green onions
Pour in 2 cups of  water, and bring to a boil
Stir together remaining water and cornstarch
Stir into the skillet gently and allow to simmer until thickened
Turn off the heat to ensure a smooth sauce
Stir in the eggs, and serve immediately over rice
